duties_responsibilities.duty: Prepare and manage design documents for civil and structural engineering projects.
Lead and manage multi-discipline projects related to real property facilities.
Analyze and solve complex technical and engineering problems to bring them to resolution.
Design waterfront facilities in compliance with nationally accepted building and seismic codes.
Oversee construction management activities, ensuring adherence to current construction building codes and regulations.
Utilize AutoCAD, Windows 10, and MS Office for design and federal government contracting purposes.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in civil or structural engineering or registration as a professional civil or structural engineer in a state, District of Columbia, Guam, or Puerto Rico.
